description.value: You duck into a safe position or minimize your profile while reloading to make your next attack. Either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} or attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, then Interact to reload. As normal, you must meet the requirements to Take Cover or Hide; you must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, benefiting from cover, or near a feature that allows you to Take Cover, and you need to be benefiting from cover or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to a creature to Hide from that creature.
